attributes.action: instigate a change in the law preventing owners of a tax disc being fined or prosecuted if they have purchased a valid tax disc online and are simply waiting for it to arrive, displaying an expired disc in the meantime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title says it all, I renewed my tax disc on the day that it expired - i'm not unable to use my car - which means I can hardly work - for the 5 days it's going to take it to arrive. I've paid for the tax disc, its period has already started - I should be able to use my vehicle. A simple change to take away so much frustration.
